name: TikTok
platform_purpose: Short-form, algorithm-driven video platform focused on rapid discovery, entertainment, and fast, snackable education.
core_voice: Same brand identity as other channels, but delivered in a simpler, more direct, and highly human way. Less corporate, more conversational and real.
tone_adaptation: Direct, fast, and attention-first. Tone is informal, energetic, and hook-driven, with an emphasis on clarity, authenticity, and quick value rather than polished brand speak.
copy_guidelines_summary: The first 1–3 seconds of the video (visual and on-screen text) are more important than the caption. Retention and watch time drive performance. Captions are short and support context, keywords, and a clear CTA. Avoid long explanations in the caption; show, do not tell.

global_guidelines.recommended_caption_length: 1–3 short lines focused on context, hook reinforcement, and CTA.
global_guidelines.recommended_hashtags: 3–6 highly relevant hashtags mixing topic, niche, and audience intent.
global_guidelines.emoji_policy: Optional and moderate. Use only if they support clarity and tone.
